verses.verse: Yet now hear <WH8085>, O Jacob <WH3290> my servant <WH5650>, and Israel <WH3478>, who I have chosen <WH977>:

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> that made <WH6213> thee <WH3335>, and formed thee from the womb <WH990>, who will help <WH5826> thee <WH3372>: Fear not <WH3290>, O Jacob my servant <WH5650>; and thou <WH3484>, Jeshurun, whom I have chosen <WH977>.

For I will pour <WH3332> water <WH4325> upon him that is thirsty <WH6771>, and streams <WH5140> upon the dry ground <WH3004>; I will pour <WH3332> my Spirit <WH7307> upon thy seed <WH2233>, and my blessing <WH1293> upon thine offspring <WH6631>:
and they shall spring up <WH6779> among <WH996> the grass <WH2682>, as willows <WH6155> by the <WH4325> watercourses <WH2988>.

One shall say <WH559>, I am Jehovah <WH3068>'s; and another shall call <WH7121> himself by the name <WH8034> of Jacob <WH3290>; and another shall subscribe <WH3789> with his hand <WH3027> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, and surname <WH3655> himself by the name <WH8034> of Israel <WH3478>.

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, the King <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478>, and his Redeemer <WH1350>, Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>: I am the first <WH7223>, and I am the last <WH314>; and besides <WH1107> me there is no God <WH430>.

And who <WH7121>, as I, shall call, and shall declare <WH5046> it <WH6186>, and set it in order for me <WH7760>, since I established the ancient <WH5769> people <WH5971>? and the things that are coming <WH857>, and that shall come <WH935> to pass <WH5046>, let them declare.

Fear <WH6342> ye not <WH7297>, neither be afraid: have I not declared <WH5046> unto thee of old <WH227>, and showed <WH8085> it <WH5707>? and ye are my witnesses. Is there <WH3426> a God <WH433> besides <WH1107> me <WH6697>? yea, there is no Rock; I know not any <WH3045>.

They that fashion <WH3335> a graven image <WH6459> are all of them vanity <WH8414>; and the things <WH2530> that they delight in shall not profit <WH3276>; and their own witnesses <WH5707> see <WH7200> not <WH3045>, nor know: that they may be put to shame <WH954>.
Who hath fashioned <WH3335> a god <WH410>, or molten <WH5258> an image <WH6459> that is profitable <WH3276> for nothing <WH1115>?

Behold <WH2270>, all his fellows shall be put to shame <WH954>; and the workmen <WH2796>, they are of men <WH120>: let them all be gathered together <WH6908>, let them stand up <WH5975>; they shall fear <WH6342>, they shall be put to shame <WH954> together <WH3162>.

The smith <WH1270> maketh an axe <WH4621>, and worketh <WH6466> in the coals <WH6352>, and fashioneth <WH3335> it with hammers <WH4717>, and worketh <WH6466> it with his strong <WH3581> arm <WH2220>: yea <WH7457>, he is hungry, and his strength <WH3581> faileth <WH369>; he drinketh <WH8354> no water <WH4325>, and is faint <WH3286>.

The carpenter <WH2796> stretcheth out <WH5186> a line <WH8279>; he marketh it out <WH8388> with a pencil <WH8279>; he shapeth <WH6213> it with planes <WH4741>, and he marketh it out <WH8388> with the compasses <WH4230>, and shapeth <WH6213> it after the figure <WH8403> of a man <WH376>, according to the beauty <WH8597> of a man <WH120>, to dwell <WH3427> in a house <WH1004>.

He heweth him down <WH3772> cedars <WH730>, and taketh <WH3947> the holm-tree <WH8645> and the oak <WH437>, and strengtheneth <WH553> for himself one among the trees <WH6086> of the forest <WH3293>: he planteth <WH5193> a fir-tree <WH766>, and the rain <WH1653> doth nourish it <WH1431>.

Then shall it be for a man <WH120> to burn <WH1197>; and he taketh <WH3947> thereof <WH2552>, and warmeth himself <WH5400>; yea, he kindleth it <WH644>, and baketh bread <WH3899>: yea <WH6466>, he maketh a god <WH410>, and worshippeth <WH7812> it <WH6213>; he maketh it a graven image <WH6459>, and falleth down thereto <WH5456>.

He burneth <WH8313> part <WH2677> thereof in <WH1119> the fire <WH784>; with part <WH2677> thereof he eateth <WH398> flesh <WH1320>; he roasteth <WH6740> roast <WH6748>, and is satisfied <WH7646>; yea <WH2552>, he warmeth himself <WH559>, and saith, Aha <WH1889>, I am warm <WH2552>, I have seen <WH7200> the fire <WH217>.

And the residue <WH7611> thereof he maketh <WH6213> a god <WH410>, even his graven image <WH6459>; he falleth down <WH5456> unto it and worshippeth <WH7812>, and prayeth <WH6419> unto it <WH559>, and saith, Deliver <WH5337> me <WH410>; for thou art my god.

They know <WH3045> not <WH995>, neither do they consider: for he hath shut <WH2902> their eyes <WH5869>, that they cannot see <WH7200>; and their hearts <WH3826>, that they cannot understand <WH7919>.

And none calleth <WH7725> to mind <WH3820>, neither is there knowledge <WH1847> nor understanding <WH8394> to say <WH559>, I have burned <WH8313> part <WH2677> of it in <WH1119> the fire <WH784>; yea <WH644>, also I have baked bread <WH3899> upon the coals <WH1513> thereof <WH6740>; I have roasted flesh <WH1320> and eaten <WH398> it <WH6213>: and shall I make the residue <WH3499> thereof an abomination <WH8441>? shall I fall down <WH5456> to the stock <WH944> of a tree <WH6086>?

He feedeth <WH7462> on ashes <WH665>; a deceived <WH2048> heart <WH3820> hath turned him aside <WH5186>; and he cannot deliver <WH5337> his soul <WH5315>, nor say <WH559>, Is there not a lie <WH8267> in my right hand <WH3225>?

Remember <WH2142> these things <WH3290>, O Jacob, and Israel <WH3478>; for thou art my servant <WH5650>: I have formed <WH3335> thee <WH5650>; thou art my servant: O Israel <WH3478>, thou shalt not be forgotten of me <WH5382>.
I have blotted out <WH4229>, as a thick cloud <WH5645>, thy transgressions <WH6588>, and <WH6051>, as a cloud, thy sins <WH2403>: return <WH7725> unto me <WH1350>; for I have redeemed thee.

Sing <WH7442>, O ye heavens <WH8064>, for Jehovah <WH3068> hath done <WH6213> it <WH7321>; shout, ye lower parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>; break forth <WH6476> into singing <WH7440>, ye mountains <WH2022>, O forest <WH3293>, and every tree <WH6086> therein <WH3068>: for Jehovah hath redeemed <WH1350> Jacob <WH3290>, and will glorify <WH6286> himself in Israel <WH3478>.

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, thy Redeemer <WH1350>, and he that formed <WH3335> thee from the womb <WH990>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>, that maketh <WH6213> all things <WH5186>; that stretcheth forth the heavens <WH8064> alone <WH7554>; that spreadeth abroad the earth <WH776> (who is with me?);

that frustrateth <WH6565> the signs <WH226> of the liars <WH907>, and maketh diviners <WH7080> mad <WH1984>; that turneth <WH7725> wise <WH2450> men backward <WH268>, and maketh their knowledge <WH1847> foolish <WH5528>;

that confirmeth <WH6965> the word <WH1697> of his servant <WH5650>, and performeth <WH7999> the counsel <WH6098> of his messengers <WH4397>; that saith <WH559> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, She shall be inhabited <WH3427>; and of the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>, They shall be built <WH1129>, and I will raise up <WH6965> the waste places thereof <WH2723>;
that saith <WH559> to the deep <WH6683>, Be dry <WH2717>, and I will dry up <WH3001> thy rivers <WH5104>;

That saith <WH559> of Cyrus <WH3566>, He is my shepherd <WH7462>, and shall perform <WH7999> all my pleasure <WH2656>, even saying <WH559> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, She shall be built <WH1129>; and of the temple <WH1964>, Thy foundation shall be laid <WH3245>.
